title: How to Get Real Answers About Your Kid’s Day at School
sub_head: Tip one: Don’t ask, ‘How was your day?’ Here are alternatives that work better.
body:
For many parents, the quest can seem like a mission impossible: Prying information from your children about what they did at school all day.
Sometimes, kids are happy to chat. But other times, they demur or respond with a single word.
